articles.title: Which human screams affect us most? The answer might surprise you - CNN
articles.description: Humans, unlike other animals, scream for a variety of reasons -- fear, pain and anger, yes -- but also joy, delight and surprise. Which do you think we respond to more? A new study provides insight.
